entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How may I assist you today?
Yeah, I need to return this VeloBand Pulse. It's not working out for me.
I understand. I can certainly help you with that. Can you please provide me with your order number?
Ugh, hold on... It's #VF789234. I bought the VeloBand Pulse a couple weeks ago. This whole smart watch thing isn’t for me.
Thank you. I see your order here. You purchased the VeloBand Pulse on [Date 15 days ago]. What's the reason for the return?
It’s just not what I expected! The heart rate readings are off, the sleep tracking is useless, and frankly, I just want my money back! I'm within the return policy, right?
Yes, absolutely. Our standard return policy is 90 days for most items. You are well within that window to return the VeloBand Pulse.
90 days? Okay, good. I thought I was cutting it close. So how do I get this thing back to you?

I can provide you with a prepaid shipping label. You'll just need to pack the VeloBand Pulse securely in its original packaging, if possible, and affix the label. Once we receive the item, we'll process your refund.
Finally! That's what I wanted to hear! How long will the refund take?
Once we receive the VeloBand Pulse, please allow 7-10 business days for the refund to be processed and reflected in your account.
Okay, 7-10 days. Fine. Can you send me that label now? I want this done ASAP.
Certainly. I've just emailed the prepaid shipping label to the email address associated with your account. Please check your inbox and spam folder. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for your help. I appreciate you making this easy.
You're welcome! We appreciate your business. Have a great day! If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us. This call may be monitored by a manager for quality assurance purposes.
